name: ocotillo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bush with sharp spines (= long points like needles) that grows in hot, dry areas in Mexico and the southwestern United States: The cacti and ocotillos that grow here are plump and green. In a few weeks the desert floor will be full of wild flowers and the ocotillo will be in bloom.
More examplesFewer examplesWe drove through a flat valley where only the odd ocotillo was growing.The landing strip is surrounded by cacti and ocotillo plants.I stopped near the border, surrounded by towering century plants and slender ocotillo.
